# Online Assessment Portal - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Full-stack online assessment portal with React frontend and Express backend using SQLite database.

## Features
- User authentication (register/login)
- MCQ-based online exams
- AI-powered video interviews
- Admin panel for exam management
- Student dashboard

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: React, React Router, Axios
- **Backend**: Express.js, SQLite3, JWT, Bcrypt
- **Database**: SQLite
